about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi! I'm Jota Uribe, An Apple platforms developer since 2012, Worked on several high top companies Apple platforms apps, published some open source utilities for Developers & currently working on my own apps.

featuredProject.name: Chroma
featuredProject.description:
Unleash your creativity with Chroma! Create stunning color combinations in seconds.
Whether you're a designer, developer, or artist, Chroma offers an intuitive and powerful toolset to create stunning color palettes effortlessly.

projects.name: AmuseKit
projects.description: A swift package to facilitate Apple Music API integration for iOS, MacOS, tvOS & watchOS projects.

projects.name: ChromaCLI
projects.description: Xcode Assets Macros alternative CLI to automatically generate static properties corresponding to color assets on SwiftUI, UIKit or AppKIt projects.

projects.name: SwiftyTree
projects.description: A command line tool to generate Tree structure from a given directory path.

projects.name: Caffeine
projects.description: A collection of reusable logic to boost Apple platform apps development process.
